name: Cohiba (Non Cuban) - Red Dot - Robusto
additionalNotes: The result of five intense years of research, the famous Cohiba cigar brand is now available in limited quantities in the US market. Often called "red dot" Cohibas due to the markings on the band, this exquisite cigar offers a medium-bodied flavor and a strong, smooth and incredibly rich character. Handmade with a toothy Cameroon wrapper and aged mixture of Dominican-grown Piloto Cubano tobaccos, Cohiba's blend sets the standard among today's premium cigars.
